about_the_game: Extirpate is an open-world survival where one will face a fight against hungry zombies and relentless survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night. Armed with a range of weapons, from silent handguns to explosive grenades, your skills will be tested as you scavenge for resources and confront the ever-present threat. With stunning visuals and intense gameplay, Extirpate offers an immersive experience where every decision shapes your fate. Will you survive or become another victim?
detailed_description: Extirpate is an open-world survival where one will face a fight against hungry zombies and relentless survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night. Armed with a range of weapons, from silent handguns to explosive grenades, your skills will be tested as you scavenge for resources and confront the ever-present threat. With stunning visuals and intense gameplay, Extirpate offers an immersive experience where every decision shapes your fate. Will you survive or become another victim?

Armed with a range of weapons, from silent handguns to explosives, your skills will be tested as you scavenge for resources. Will you survive or become another victim?
